name: Penmode3
body:
# Penmode3 13/04/2013 -> [Penmode](https://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode) release date
15/11/2013 -> [Penmode2](https://github.com/Pinperepette/penmode2) release date
***Now new Penmode-Revolution! And it's ready to hit the "cloud"*** *** #### Why Penmode3 is a Revolution? In the past many people had proposed a Penmode "cloud" or "client / server" version, now they have it. Penmode3 is formed by 2 part, the "Backend", made with Node.JS, and the "Frontend" made with HTML and Javascript.
You can install the Backend on your Server, your PC, your RaspberryPi... And run the Frontend from everywhere, just with a simple Internet connection.
And you can make Frontend in every language you want!
People asking for Android/iOS Penmode can have a Native Application!
Read the [wiki](http://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode3/wiki) for more information! #### How Do I install Penmode3? If you have a working Node.js & NPM setup, just type
`npm install penmode3`
For other instruction read the [Readme](http://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode3) #### How Do I install Penmode3 Plugins? Download this [penmode3-plugin Repo](http://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode3-penmode) and start penmode3 with
`penmode3 --plugins /downloaded_folder` #### When I can use Penmode3? (Use-Case) * You want to run your pentest from your powerfull VPS/Server * Your (company) firewall does not allow you to access some ports on the target system * You don't know how to use your Raspberry Pi * More... Let me know how/when you use Penmode3 in the most strange way on Twitter with the hashtag [#Penmode3](https://twitter.com/search?q=%23Penmode3&src=typd) #### How Penmode3 works? Read the [wiki](http://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode3/wiki) #### How can I write new Penmode3 Plugins? Read the [wiki](http://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode3/wiki) *** ### You can't use the name "penmode" in your project!! Why? It's your trademark? I don't think so. I've started develop penmode1 since its first line.
The Team split up, but I think that continue the project with its true name is not a shame.

I'm developing Penmode3 alone, others Team member are doing different things.
An ex-member and his team is working on a project named **Pen-Box**.
Another ex-member is working on a OSINT All-In-One tool named **Naonis**.
Go search for that, both seems interesting! Thanks. TheZero, ex-PH#0S Team Member
